# Globals.Min&lt;T&gt; method

Gets the Minimum number from a sequence numbers

```csharp
public static T Min<T>(params T[] items)
    where T : INumber<T>
```

| parameter | description |
| --- | --- |
| T | Type |
| items | A sequence of numbers |

## Return Value

The minimum of the numbers
